com.im.njams.sdk.communication.http

Class SharedHttpsSseReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.AbstractReceiver
      • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.http.HttpSseReceiver
        • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.http.HttpsSseReceiver
          • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.http.SharedHttpsSseReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Receiver, ShareableReceiver<javax.ws.rs.sse.InboundSseEvent>, ClasspathValidator

    public class SharedHttpsSseReceiver
extends HttpsSseReceiver
implements ShareableReceiver<javax.ws.rs.sse.InboundSseEvent>
    Receiver, which shares a connection and has to pick the right messages from it.
    Author:
    bwand

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Description copied from class: AbstractReceiver
        This method should be used to create a connection, and if the startup fails, close all resources. It will be called by the reconnect method. It should throw an Exception if anything unexpected or unwanted happens.
        Overrides:
        connect in class HttpsSseReceiver
